snippet: The incoming New York police commissioner, William J. Bratton, is said to be planning significant changes in personnel, priorities and how the department is organized and run.
abstract: Incoming New York City Police Commissioner William J Bratton provides few details about his plans for his second stint running nation's largest police force, but he is said to be planning significant changes in personnel, priorities and how the New York City Police Department is organized and run.

byline.original: By WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM and JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN

lead_paragraph: The incoming New York police commissioner, William J. Bratton, is said to be planning significant changes in personnel, priorities and how the department is organized and run.

headline.main: Bratton Is Expected to Reshape Police to Rebuild Relationship With Public
headline.print_headline: Bratton Is Expected to Alter Police Policy to Rebuild Connections With Public
